trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> that holds the content of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> che contiene il contenuto di un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] documento.

trans-unit.source: An XpsDocument contains a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> that comprises one or more <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements.
trans-unit.target: Contiene un XpsDocument un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>che include uno o più <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>elementi.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A> constructor is passed a reference to a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> for writing, storing, and reading the content elements of the document.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A>costruttore viene passato un riferimento a un <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>per la scrittura, l'archiviazione e lettura di elementi di contenuto del documento.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new empty [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> is created by using the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Un nuovo vuoto [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>viene creato utilizzando il <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.%23ctor%2A>costruttore.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: An existing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> is opened by using the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto esistente [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>viene aperto con il <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> root is added to an empty [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>radice viene aggiunto a un oggetto vuoto [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>chiamando il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> elements with printer information and control can also be associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>, or on individual <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> elements that are stored in the XpsDocument.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>gli elementi con le informazioni della stampante e il controllo possono anche essere associati il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>, o nei singoli <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>e <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>elementi archiviati in XpsDocument.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence></xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] vedere XML Paper Specification (XPS) per il download all'indirizzo [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> class with access to a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> and default interleaving, resource, and compression options.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> classe con accesso a un oggetto specificato [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> e opzioni di compressione, risorse e interfoliazione predefinite.

trans-unit.source: The target [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-metro-md.md)] package for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La destinazione [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-metro-md.md)] pacchetto per il <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> class that is contained in a specified <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> with specified default interleaving, resource, and compression options.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> classe contenuti in un oggetto specificato <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> con opzioni di compressione, risorse e interfoliazione predefinite specificate.

trans-unit.source: The target package for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il pacchetto di destinazione per il <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The package compression option.
trans-unit.target: L'opzione di compressione del pacchetto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> class that is contained in a specified <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> file with default interleaving, resource, and compression options.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> classe contenuti in un oggetto specificato <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> file con le opzioni di compressione, risorse e interfoliazione predefinite.

trans-unit.source: The path and file name of the target <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso e il nome della destinazione <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> per il <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The file I/O mode in which to open the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La modalità dei / o file in cui aprire il <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> class that is contained in a specified <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> with the specified default interleaving, resource, and compression options.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> classe contenuti in un oggetto specificato <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> con le opzioni di compressione, risorse e interfoliazione predefinito specificato.

trans-unit.source: The target package for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il pacchetto di destinazione per il <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The package compression option.
trans-unit.target: L'opzione di compressione del pacchetto.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the document as a string.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] per il documento sotto forma di stringa.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> class that is contained in a specified <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> file with default interleaving, resource, and compression options.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> classe contenuti in un oggetto specificato <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> file con le opzioni di compressione, risorse e interfoliazione predefinite.

trans-unit.source: The path and file name of the target <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso e il nome della destinazione <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> per il <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The file I/O mode in which to open the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La modalità dei / o file in cui aprire il <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The package compression option.
trans-unit.target: L'opzione di compressione del pacchetto.

trans-unit.source: Adds a root <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref> to the package and returns a writer.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge una radice <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"> </xref> al pacchetto e restituisce un writer.

trans-unit.source: Although this class uses a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be a set (sequence) of one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Anche se questa classe viene utilizzato un nome singolare, un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>può essere un set (sequenza) di uno <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>o più documenti.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] fixed-document sequence writer for this <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] writer di sequenza del documento predefinito per questo <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a thumbnail image to the package.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un'immagine di anteprima per il pacchetto.

trans-unit.source: The format of the image.
trans-unit.target: Il formato dell'immagine.

trans-unit.source: The newly added <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Appena aggiunta <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Closes the XPS document <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Chiude il documento XPS <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> was opened for write access, data buffers are written to the store and the physical document <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> is closed.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>è stato aperto per l'accesso in scrittura, dati i buffer vengono scritti nell'archivio e il documento fisico <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>viene chiuso.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: After Close has been called, no parts of the document can be accessed with this <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> instance.
trans-unit.target: Dopo la chiusura è stato chiamato, nessuna parte del documento sono accessibili con questa <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>istanza.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: Gets the core <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties"></xref> of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto principale <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties"> </xref> del [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] documento.

trans-unit.source: The core properties of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref><xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Le proprietà principali del <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter"></xref> for writing an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea un <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter"> </xref> per la scrittura un <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document to write.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] documento da scrivere.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter"></xref> to use for writing the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter"> </xref> da utilizzare per la scrittura di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] documento.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> and optionally, releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite utilizzate da di <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> e, facoltativamente, rilascia le risorse gestite.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato dal metodo pubblico `Dispose()` (metodo) e <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`richiama il metodo protetto `Dispose(Boolean)` metodo con il `disposing` parametro impostato su `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>richiama `Dispose` con `disposing` impostato su `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando il `disposing` parametro è true, questo metodo rilascia tutte le risorse utilizzate dagli oggetti gestiti da questo <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>riferimenti.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo richiama il `Dispose()` metodo di ciascun oggetto cui viene fatto riferimento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per rilasciare le risorse gestite e non gestite. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader"></xref> for reading the document.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader"> </xref> per la lettura del documento.

trans-unit.source: Although this class uses a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be a set (sequence) of one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Anche se questa classe viene utilizzato un nome singolare, un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>può essere un set (sequenza) di uno <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>o più documenti.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader"></xref> for reading the document.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader"> </xref> per la lettura del documento.

trans-unit.source: Returns the fixed-document sequence at the root of the package.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la sequenza di documenti statici alla radice del pacchetto.

trans-unit.source: Although this class uses a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be a set (sequence) of one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Anche se questa classe viene utilizzato un nome singolare, un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>può essere un set (sequenza) di uno <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>o più documenti.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref> of the package.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"> </xref> del pacchetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the package is readable.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il pacchetto è leggibile.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the package is readable; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il pacchetto è leggibile; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the package can be digitally signed.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il pacchetto può essere firmato digitalmente.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the package can be signed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il pacchetto può essere firmato; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the package is writable.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il pacchetto è accessibile in scrittura.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the package is writable; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il pacchetto è scrivibile; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Deletes a signature from the package.
trans-unit.target: Elimina una firma del pacchetto.

trans-unit.source: The signature that is deleted.
trans-unit.target: La firma viene eliminata.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] signatures that are associated with the package.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] firme che sono associate al pacchetto.

trans-unit.source: The Signatures list identifies what parts are signed and whether the signatures are valid.
trans-unit.target: L'elenco di firme identifica le parti firmate e se le firme sono valide.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"></xref> objects that represent the signatures that are associated with the package.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> di <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"> </xref> gli oggetti che rappresentano le firme che sono associate al pacchetto.

trans-unit.source: Signs a collection of package parts with a specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Firma una raccolta di parti del pacchetto con un certificato x.&509; specificato.

trans-unit.source: If `certificate` is `null`, a dialog box appears that enables the user to select an installed X.509 certificate, such as from a smart card reader.
trans-unit.target: Se `certificate` è `null`, viene visualizzata una finestra di dialogo che consente all'utente di selezionare un certificato x.&509; installato, ad esempio da un lettore di smart card.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to use in signing each part; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to prompt the user to select an installed certificate.
trans-unit.target: Il certificato x.&509; da usare per firmare ogni parte. o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> per richiedere all'utente di selezionare un certificato installato.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to store the certificate in the package; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per archiviare il certificato nel pacchetto. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Flags that indicate what dependent parts must be excluded from the signing.
trans-unit.target: Flag che indicano le parti dipendenti devono essere escluse dalla firma.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"></xref> that contains information about the signature.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"> </xref> che contiene informazioni sulla firma.

trans-unit.source: Signs a collection of package parts by using a specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Firma una raccolta di parti del pacchetto usando un certificato x.&509; specificato.

trans-unit.source: If `certificate` is `null`, a dialog box appears that enables the user to select an installed X.509 certificate, such as from a smart card reader.
trans-unit.target: Se `certificate` è `null`, viene visualizzata una finestra di dialogo che consente all'utente di selezionare un certificato x.&509; installato, ad esempio da un lettore di smart card.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to use in signing each part; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to prompt the user to select an installed certificate.
trans-unit.target: Il certificato x.&509; da usare per firmare ogni parte. o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> per richiedere all'utente di selezionare un certificato installato.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to store the certificate in the package; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per archiviare il certificato nel pacchetto. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Flags that indicate what dependent parts are excluded from the signing.
trans-unit.target: Flag che indicano quali parti dipendenti escluse dalla firma.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] to assign to the signature.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] da assegnare alla firma.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"></xref> that contains information about the signature.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"> </xref> che contiene informazioni sulla firma.

trans-unit.source: Signs a collection of package parts with a specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Firma una raccolta di parti del pacchetto con un certificato x.&509; specificato.

trans-unit.source: If `certificate` is `null`, a dialog box is presented that enables the user to select an installed X.509 certificate, such as from a smart card reader.
trans-unit.target: Se `certificate` è `null`, viene visualizzata una finestra di dialogo che consente all'utente di selezionare un certificato x.&509; installato, ad esempio da un lettore di smart card.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> is thrown if `certificate` is `null` and no certificates are installed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>viene generata se `certificate` è `null` e nessun certificato è installato.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to use in signing each part; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to prompt the user to select an installed certificate.
trans-unit.target: Il certificato x.&509; da usare per firmare ogni parte. o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> per richiedere all'utente di selezionare un certificato installato.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to store the certificate in the package; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per archiviare il certificato nel pacchetto. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Flags that indicate what dependent parts to exclude from the signing.
trans-unit.target: Flag che indicano le parti dipendenti da escludere dalla firma.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] to assign to the signature.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] da assegnare alla firma.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to verify that <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.IsSignable*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> before signing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per verificare che <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.IsSignable*>è <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> prima della firma; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.IsSignable*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"></xref> that contains information about the signature.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"> </xref> che contiene informazioni sulla firma.

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro supporta il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] dell'infrastruttura e non deve essere utilizzato direttamente dal codice.

trans-unit.source: Use the type-safe <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Dispose*> method instead.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il tipo indipendente <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Dispose*>metodo invece.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] thumbnail image that is associated with the document.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] immagine di anteprima è associato al documento.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail"></xref> that represents the thumbnail image that is associated with the document.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail"> </xref> che rappresenta l'immagine di anteprima è associato al documento.
